titles.title: JP31 Come on, let's get up and go,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come on, let's get up and go,
Let everyone know
We've got a reason to shout and to sing 'Cause Jesus loves us
And that's a wonderful thing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Go! go! go! go! get up and go,
Don't be sleepy or slow
You, you, you, you know what to do,
Give your life to Him
